Package GOFO.UI

Class UI

java.lang.Object
GOFO.UI.UI
public class UI
extends java.lang.Object
UI: Let a User interact with the system.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ntajugumba Guy Cherubin

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UI()
    Constructs a new UI object and calls a main menu.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private int getProfileType()
    Get the profile type of the user.
    private void logAdmin()
    Log an administrator in after checking if the password is correct.
    private void logIn()
    Get user id and password, After checking if they are correct, get the profile type, and Initialize a UI corresponding to the user
    private void mainMenu()
    Show a User options to choose from.
    private void signUp()
    Register a new user in the database.
    private boolean validateEmail​(java.lang.String email)
    Checks if a given email has a match with the emailRegex(email pattern)
    private boolean validateID​(java.lang.String id)
    Validate an identification which must be 14 characters long
    private boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String password)
    Checks if a given email has a match with the passwordRegex(password pattern)

  • Constructor Details

    • UI

      public UI()
      Constructs a new UI object and calls a main menu.

  • Method Details

    • mainMenu

      private void mainMenu()
      Show a User options to choose from.

    • logAdmin

      private void logAdmin()
      Log an administrator in after checking if the password is correct.

      For an administrator, the id is "admin" So, no need to ask the id.

    • logIn

      private void logIn()
      Get user id and password, After checking if they are correct, get the profile type, and Initialize a UI corresponding to the user

    • signUp

      private void signUp()
      Register a new user in the database.

    • getProfileType

      private int getProfileType()
      Get the profile type of the user.

      It can be a Player or a Playground owner profile.

      Returns:
      profile type

    • validatePassword

      private boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Checks if a given email has a match with the passwordRegex(password pattern)
      Parameters:
      password - to be checked
      Returns:
      true if found match otherwise returns false

    • validateID

      private boolean validateID​(java.lang.String id)
      Validate an identification which must be 14 characters long
      Parameters:
      id - : id to be validate
      Returns:
      true if the length is 14 otherwise returns false

    • validateEmail

      private boolean validateEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Checks if a given email has a match with the emailRegex(email pattern)
      Parameters:
      email - to be checked
      Returns:
      true if found match otherwise returns false
